questions: What is the full form of HDI?
Why do some people oppose dams ? Give one reason.
answers: Because this disrupt the lives of people who are displaced.

questions: What other goal is included in the developmental goals besides having better income ?
answers: Equal treatment, freedom, education, security and peace.

questions: What is denoted by the life expectancy at birth ?
Why Kerala has low infant mortality rate ?
answers: It has adequate provision of basic health and educational facilities.

questions: How can we achieve the development goals of different sections of our society ?
Which state of India has a high infant mortality rate according to data 2003 ?
What is India’s HDI rank in the world?
Which is a development goal for the landless rural labourers ?
answers: More days of work and better wages.

questions: What do you mean by ‘Literacy Rate’ ?
answers: It measures the proportion of literate population in the 7 years and above age group.

questions: In which state, literacy rate is the highest ?
How we will calculate Body Mass Index ?
answers: Dividing the weight by the square of the height in meters.

questions: Which country has the largest size of illiterate population in the age group of 15 + in the world ?
Write the components of Human Development Index ?
answers: Life expectancy, gross enrolment ratio and per capita income.
